title: DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: DPS Hour 1
description:
Adam Silver talks to Dan about his days at Duke and Michael Jordan before he was Air-Jordan. Adam says he originally wanted to work in media after being a lawyer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
